column1: <font face="arial" size="3"><b>General scientific objective and approaches:&nbsp

To develop novel approaches to the design and analysis of experiments as well as the computing of data sets. Stochastic and deterministic mathematical modelling is deployed to provide a better understanding and interpretation of biological processes relevant to crop production systems.
<LI>Understanding dynamic biological processes such as disease epidemic development and gene-flow in populations through application of models and simulations
<LI>Analysis and interpretation of complex biological data sets such as those collected over long time series
and suggestions about this WEB site are always welcome
